SettingsStorage Data Structures

Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
CSettingsSettings base class
CSettingsStorageAbstract class that represent a storage mechanism
CSettingsStorageIniFileCSettingsStorage implementation for INI files
CSettingsStorageMSXMLCSettingsStorage implementation for XML using MSXML
CSettingsStorageMSXMLFileCSettingsStorage implementation for XML files using MSXML
CSettingsStorageRegistryCSettingsStorage implementation for the registry
